import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import BackIcon from '../../../assets/icons/ui/BackIcon'; import CancelIcon from '../../../assets/icons/ui/CancelIcon'; import EyeIcon from '../../../assets/icons/ui/EyeIcon'; import NextIcon from '../../../assets/icons/ui/NextIcon'; import EmptyIllu from '../../../assets/illustrations/EmptyIllu'; import SadIllustration from '../../../assets/illustrations/SadIllustration'; import { getMe, reset } from '../../../features/auth/authSlice'; import { getExams } from '../../../features/examens/examenSlice'; import { links } from '../../../router/constant'; import FormButton from '../../components/button/FormButton'; import EmptySection from '../../components/container/EmptySection'; import Textfield from '../../components/textfield/Textfield'; import MainLayout from '../../layout/MainLayout'; const Etats = () => { const limit = 10 const [examen, setExamen] = useState(""); const [dateDebut, setDateDebut] = useState(""); const [dateFin, setDateFin] = useState(""); const [page, setPage] = useState(1) const [debut, setDebut] = useState(0) const [fin, setFin] = useState(limit) const dispatch = useDispatch() const {me, examinateur} = useSelector( (state) => state.auth ) const userAuth = useSelector( (state) => state.auth ) const getMyEtats = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const data = { examinateur_id: examinateur, date_de_debut: dateDebut, date_de_fin: dateFin } dispatch(getExams(data)) } const {examens, isLoading, isSuccess, isError, message} = useSelector( (state) => state.examen ) const nextPage = () => { setDebut(debut + limit) setFin(fin + limit) setPage(page + 1) } const prevPage = () => { setPage(page - 1) setDebut(debut - limit) setFin(fin - limit) } const removeModal = (id) => { document.getElementById(id).classList.remove("is--show"); } const showModal = (id, exam) => { setExamen(exam) document.getElementById(id).classList.add("is--show"); } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getMe()) return () => { dispatch(reset()) // dispatch(examReset()) } },[dispatch, examinateur]) if(userAuth.isLoading){ return (
) } if(userAuth.isError){ return ( {userAuth.message} ) } return ( { userAuth.isSuccess && me && (
Accueil / Mes états
{/*

Programmation

*/}

Mes états

{ isSuccess && examens && examens.length > 0 ? (
) : (
) }
Date de début Date de fin
Chercher
{ isLoading ? (
{"Chargement des données en cours"}

{"Veuillez patienter un instant..."}

) : ( isError ? ( {message} ) : ( isSuccess && (
{ examens && (limit <= examens.length) && ( <>
) }
{ examens && examens.length > 0 ? (
#
Code examen
Lieu et Salle
Date et Heure
Nombre de candidats
Actions
{ examens.map((exam, index) => (
{index + 1}

{exam.code_examen}

{exam.lieu}
{exam.details.salle.nom_salle_code}

Date: {exam.date_examen}
Heure: {exam.heure_examen}

{exam.nombre_de_candidat}
)) }
) : ( Aucun examen ) }
) ) ) }
) }

{`Information de l'examen `}

{ examen && ( <> { examen.statut_examen.toLowerCase() === "cloturer" ? ( Clôturer ):( examen.statut_examen.toLowerCase() === "annuler" ? ( Annuler ): ( examen.statut_examen.toLowerCase() === "terminer" ? ( Terminer ) : ( En attente ) ) ) }
Code examen: {examen.code_examen}
Nombre de candidats: {examen.nombre_de_candidat}
Date: {examen.date_examen}
Heure: {examen.heure_examen}
Lieu: {examen.lieu}
Salle: {examen.details.salle.nom_salle_code}
Mode: {examen.details.mode}
Langue: {examen.details.langue}
Catégorie: {examen.categorie_permis}
) }
); }; export default Etats;
